section.title: RDF element: dmlex:EtymonLanguage
section.para: Represents one of several allowed values for the language property of etymonUnit objects.

listitem.para: dmlex:langCode REQUIRED (exactly 1) of type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#language (subproperty of http://www.w3.org/ns/lemon/lime#language)
dmlex:displayName OPTIONAL (at most 1) of type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string
